page.title: 04EDUCATION
page.content:
{ The village has had a school for 150 {years.In 1971, a new school was built {on the outskirts of the village.}
There were 80 to 90 pupils at that time. The school is set in pleasant surroundings and is attached to the village hall. This facility is used by the school during the day for drama, PE. and lunch. At September 1985 there are two teachers, two nursery assistants (one part time), two cleaners and two cooks.One nursery assistant looks after a boy who has brittle bones. There are only 32 children on the register plus 3 part time (afternoons) nursery children.A special area language unit may open in January 1986.
